alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Fremont; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 3:50PM MDT until July 19 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Fremont County in central Colorado... Southwestern El Paso County in east central Colorado... Northern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 350 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of Penrose, or 19 miles southwest of Colorado Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Fremont, southwestern El Paso and northern Pueblo Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
